entities: United Nations Verification Mission in Colombia
summary:
The Security Council:

Reaffirms its commitment to the peace process in Colombia, welcoming progress made since the Final Agreement, but noting ongoing challenges, particularly violence in conflict-affected areas.

Recalls its resolutions and statements on the peace process, including the role of the UN Verification Mission in Colombia, established to verify implementation of the Final Agreement.

Extends the mandate of the Verification Mission until 31 October 2023.

Requests the Secretary-General to provide recommendations on verifying sections 1 and 6.2 of the Final Agreement, on comprehensive rural reform and the Ethnic Chapter.

Expresses willingness to consider swiftly these recommendations and to work with the Government of Colombia on the further extension of the mandate of the Verification Mission.
